title: Special Guest Lecture
content: The 'Innovation Anywhere, Opportunities Everywhere' lecture was delivered by Dr. Sethuraman Panchanathan, Director, National Science Foundation

title: Sonipat_IITD Academic Outreach Day
content: Academic Outreach Day 2022 was organized by Academic Outreach and New Initiatives at IITD_TechnoPark Sonipat

title: Engaging Communication for Research
content: Workshop on 'Engaging Communication for Research' was conducted by Prof. Subir Dey, Department of Design, IIT Delhi

title: NEP Panel Discussion
content: Evolution in Education Policies from Wood's Dispatch (1854) to New Education Policy (2020) : Accomplishments and persisting Challenges

title: Felicitation Ceremony for Academic Outreach Programs
content: The felicitation ceremony for STEM Mentorship Program and Change Makers Summer Boot Camp was organized on 24th June 2022 at Lecture Hall Complex

title: Exhibition for Change Makers Summer Boot Camp 2022
content: The Showcase Exhibition for Change Makers Summer Boot Camp was organised on 24th June 2022 from 3-4 pm at Makerspace

title: STEM Lecture Series - 7
content: Research Ethics and Plagiarism was delivered by Ms. Vanita Kaanchandani (Assistant Librarian, IIT Delhi).

title: 8th Annual India-Purdue Collaborative Lecture Series
content: 'The Future of Food and Agriculture' by Prof. Lusk, Purdue University.

title: STEM Lecture Series - 6
content: The Mechanical Engineering lecture was delivered by Prof. M.R. Ravi (Department of Mechanical Engineering).

title: Institute Lecture
content: 'Functional Imaging of the Human Brain' by Prof. Nancy Kanwisher, Neuroscientist at Brain and Cognitive Science Department, MIT

title: Sci-Tech Spins Lecture Series - 8
content: 'Learning from the past: Climate change and civilization changes' by Prof. Yama Dixit (Centre for Atmospheric Sciences, IIT Delhi). YouTube

title: STEM Lecture Series - 5
content: The Electrical Engineering and Civil Engineering lectures were delivered by Prof. Subrat Kar (Department of Electrical Engineering) and Prof. Shashank Bishnoi (Department of Civil Engineering).
